attributes.action: Cancel all laws stopping the UK from leaving the EU & leave the EU by 12 April.
attributes.additional_details:
We were promised many times by the UK prime minster that we would leave the EU on 29th March 2019 exactly 2 years after Article 50 was triggered.

So far the prime minter has failed to honour the winning vote "LEAVE" of the 2016 referendum which was won fair and square. 

instead she is stalling for more time with a so called "Deal" that we must have from the EU before the UK can leave the EU.

We, the people just want to leave WITHOUT a deal and on 12th April 2019 as our Brexit is now OVERDUE.
attributes.background:
On 23rd June 2016 an in/out referendum was held for the British people to vote Stay/Leave the EU - The leave vote won the referendum.

Please sign this petition to stop the UK government from 'stealling" our chance of "Brexit" and preventing the UK from Leaving the EU which is now OVERDUE.
